description: An ISO 3166-2 subdivision, commonly referred to as a 'State', 'Province', or 'Parish'

Abbreviation.description: The common abbreviation for the subdivision, if applicable.

Category.description: The subdivision category such as 'state' or 'territory'

Identifier.description: The internal identififer of the subdivision.

IsoCode.description: The ISO 3166-2 code of the subdivision

IsoTwoCode.description: The ISO 3166-1 two character code of the country to which this subdivision belongs.

Name.description: The common name of the subdivision.
